keyword: how many calories in a double double
title: How Many Calories in a Double Double?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a double double from In-N-Out, including full nutrition breakdown like protein, fat, carbs, sodium, and easy variations.
h1: How Many Calories in a Double Double?
assumptions: Standard In-N-Out Double Double: two beef patties, two cheese slices, lettuce, tomato, onion, spread, on toasted bun; no modifications.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, exact preparation, and customizations; values based on official In-N-Out data. Check app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: A standard Double Double burger contains about 670 calories and 37 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging or apps.

tweaks.label: Protein Style (lettuce wrap instead of bun)
Animal Style (extra spread, mustard, grilled onions, pickles)

faqs.q: How many calories are in an In-N-Out Double Double?
faqs.a: Approximately 670 calories for the standard version.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a Double Double?
faqs.a: About 37 g of protein per burger.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in a Double Double?
faqs.a: Around 1440 mg, mostly from cheese, spread, and bun.

faqs.q: Does a Double Double have a lot of fat?
faqs.a: Yes, 41 g total fat, including 20 g saturated fat from patties and cheese.

faqs.q: How do customizations affect calories in a Double Double?
faqs.a: Swapping bun for lettuce saves ~240 kcal; adding Animal Style extras adds ~190 kcal.
